programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: A Fatal Mistake
programme.desc: According to Drew, the baby was bottle-fed gin and died. Shawn, the grieving mother, claims she had no prior knowledge of the bottle containing gin and believes it was tampered with, possibly by her own sister and friend. Who’s responsible?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Do You Really Believe That 70 Year Old Is The Father?
programme.desc: Kerenina and Clay have a four-month-old son, but Clay cannot deny his suspicions that the child might actually have been fathered by their 71 year old roommate, William.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Dad, Did You Murder Our Mom?
programme.desc: After Juanita’s mother was murdered, things became strange, especially when her father Eric didn’t attend the funeral. She believes he was involved in the murder, but her sister Nora thinks she’s crazy. Can Steve help put this mystery to bed?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve is Speechless
programme.desc: Nykki, Jayda, Tammy and Pamela are here because Larry has fathered children with them. They say Larry not only an abusive deadbeat, but also engages in drugs, alcohol and pimps some of them out. Don’t miss the drama today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: She's Not Pregnant, It's A Trap
programme.desc: Elisha is claiming to be pregnant with John's baby, but Elisha's friend Brittany claims that she made up the pregnancy to keep John from breaking up with her. Then, during her pregnancy, Linzy contracted an STD and believes that Alex gave it to her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 5 Years of Abuse, Is He the Father?
programme.desc: Ashley’s boyfriend Tyjuan thinks his abuse is justified because he suspects her of cheating and doubts the paternity of their five kids! Then, Natasha gave birth two weeks ago, but fears that the father is her rapist and not her husband Daniel!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 3 Year Old Locked in the Basement
programme.desc: Michael and Flora are no longer dating, but they have a 3 year old daughter together. Michael thinks that Flora’s boyfriend Dwayne is abusing his daughter, but is he telling the truth? Watch Steve get to the bottom of this!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Son Said You Beat Him
programme.desc: Davonna believes that her husband Michael never abused her son. Her son told his dad Brandon that Michael punched him in the nose and back. Then, Evie wants to prove that she never abused her son and deserves custody of him from her mother!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Won't Beat Me Again
programme.desc: Taking a stand! After years of abuse and living in fear, Kristen finally thought she found the strength to leave her abusive relationship with Terrell behind. He openly admits to abusing Kristen and taking his rage out on her, but thinks he can change for the better. Changing a bad habit is never easy, but Steve may be the last hope this family has.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Want Him To Be The Father?
programme.desc: Ashley's mother is here because she says she's witnessed first hand Ashley's boyfriend Scott's abusive ways. She says that Scott has completely isolated Ashley and her grandchild from the rest of her family.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Failed to Protect Your Son
programme.desc: Taquita’s ex is in custody for murdering her child, but her step-sisters think that she was aware of the man’s abusive behavior! Then, Dianne gained custody of Tanya’s toddler son after Tanya’s ex shook him, but she suspects Tanya is the abuser!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Need Answers Now
programme.desc: Amanda is here because she's trying to save her marriage to Bo. Bo's not sure if he's the father of her child and needs a DNA test to prove the truth. Plus, Julie says that she believes she's being cheated on by Stevie.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Was I Sold For Drugs?
programme.desc: As a child, this young girl was left by her mother to be raped by an older man in order for her to get drugs.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I'm Not Sorry I Beat Her
programme.desc: Taylor and Joseph admit to getting into violent arguments where he slapped, choked, scratched and even threw objects at her, but agree that if they can prove neither cheated, then their violent streak will end. But will it end?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve's Had Enough
programme.desc: At seventeen, Dimitrius has already had three children and now four additional women claim to be pregnant with his baby. Then Ethel and her daughters need Steve's help to right their wrongs and get their family back on track.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Why Are You Dating A Child?
programme.desc: Sheila fears that her teen grand-daughter is having sex with a 26-year old family-friend. Then, Jaquella started dating her boyfriend Shaquille when he was a teen. Shaquille's mother is here to confront Jaquella for sleeping with her child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Failed Five Times?
programme.desc: A man takes a lie-detector test after being accused of hurting his girlfriend's child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Will You Stay To Get Beat?
programme.desc: Ashley alleges that her fiancé John has repeatedly abused both her and her son. To make matters worse, this isn't John's first incident with abuse, as his former girlfriend, another Ashley, was also abused and is now here to save her friend.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Explosive Lie Detector Results
programme.desc: Latoya is worried that her sister Tenielle’s boyfriend Ashley is molesting Tenielle’s 4 year old daughter! Latoya and the child’s father Antonio are here because they demand Ashley prove his innocence with a lie detector test!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: He's Not Your Son
programme.desc: The laziest husband and wife lie about their child in order to get support from a woman who believes the child is her grandchild.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: If He Fails, This Stage Won't Be Enough
programme.desc: Police informed Latoya that her husband was accused of molesting her daughter. She immediately kicked him out, but feels torn. Then, Jesenia suspects her ex Melvin molested their daughter, but Melvin maintains his innocence!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Believe My Son!
programme.desc: Josephine's family was ripped apart after her boyfriend Mark was accused of molestation. Her son, Anthony and his girlfriend, Renee believe Mark molested their 2 year old son. But Mark believes that Renee coached her son to say this!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Is My Wife A Prostitute
programme.desc: Jesus is worried that Sonja is sleeping with other men in exchange for Cocaine. Then, Jessica is desperate to change Josh's controlling and abusive ways. She says she can no longer live with Josh if he's going to continue threatening her and accusing her of prostitution.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I'll Fight for My Family
programme.desc: A woman is married to one man and engaged to another at the same time. Now the two men are fighting over who's the father of her kids.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Who’s Hurting My Granddaughter?
programme.desc: Maria is convinced that her son’s ex-girlfriend Amy and her new boyfriend Brian are abusing and neglecting her granddaughter. But Amy says that Maria is racist and angry because her granddaughter is being raised in a Hispanic household

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Got a Bad Feeling About This
programme.desc: Ashley and DeNorris accuse each other of cheating; Jim denies having sex with his fiancee's sister and underage girls.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Will These Results Destroy Us
programme.desc: Christopher had to move away for a job and his wife, Ashley, says that she won't move until he proves that he's not a cheater. Then, Tim is worried that his wife Sasha is cheating because he found Facebook messages from her ex.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I've Seen Him Hit Her
programme.desc: Valarie is here to get custody of her children because she says their father Roy has been abusing them. Roy says that it's her boyfriend who is the abuser. Then, Jennifer is here to because she want's her sister Amber to leave her boyfriend Ceasarae.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: He Left Me For My Sister
programme.desc: Ashley’s first love, Chris, betrayed her for her sister and now faces abuse allegations.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Said I Wasn't The Father
programme.desc: Alvin began to get very distant from his family, so Andrea began a relationship with Chris, a man she met on a chat line. Then, Brittany and Tony have an infant daughter together, but since getting Brittany pregnant he has abandoned his family.
